src_original: sarvadharmaprakṛtipariśuddhitaḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmāvacanataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhataḥ prahāṇasamatayā prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirvāṇaprāptitastathatāsamatayā prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 一切法同於滅，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 一切法如涅槃，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: sarvadharmā nāgacchanti,  na gacchanti,  ajānānā ajātā atyantājātita iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  ātmaparādarśanataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 一切法不來不去，無所生，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 一切法無彼我，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: sarvadharmā āryārhantaḥ prakṛtipariśuddhā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  apahṛtabhārāḥ sarvadharmābhārānāropaṇatayeti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmādeśāpradeśataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 賢聖畢竟清淨，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 捨一切檐，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是。 何以故？

src_original: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte adeśamapradeśaṃ prakṛītisvabhāvataḥ sarvadharmanirodhaprahlādanatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 色無形無處，自性無故； 受、想、行、識無形無處，自性無故。

src_original: aratyaviratitaḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  araktāviraktatayā prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 「一切法無熱，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 一切法無染無離，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: rūpaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate /
tgt_original: 色無所有故，無染無離；

src_original: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate prakṛtipariśuddhatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmā asaktāḥ saṅgāsaṅgavigatā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 受、想、行、識無所有故，無染無離。 「一切法性清淨，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 一切法無繫著，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yatheyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paridamanāya pratyupasthitā anunāmāya bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām //
tgt_original: 」釋提桓因白佛言： 「希有，世尊！ 般若波羅蜜為迴向故，不為高心。

src_original: bodhiḥ sarvadharmā buddhajñānāvabodhanatayeti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmaśūnyānimittāpraṇihitatayā prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmā bhaiṣajyamaitrīpūrvaṃgamatayeti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 一切法是菩提覺以佛慧，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 一切法空、無相、無作，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: sarvadharmā maitrīvihāriṇaḥ karuṇāvihāriṇo muditāvihāriṇa upekṣāvihāriṇa iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmā brahmabhūtā doṣānutpādanataḥ sarvadoṣānutpādanata iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 一切法是藥，慈心為首，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 一切法梵相慈相，無過無恚，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: samudrāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 大海無邊，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: gaganāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /  meruvicitratayā prajñāpāramitāvicitratā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 虛空無邊，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 日照無邊，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: rūpāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā (Vaidya 236)
tgt_original: 色離，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 受、想、行、識離，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: sūryaraśmimaṇḍalāparyantāvabhāsanatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /  sarvaśabdāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 一切音聲無邊，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 諸性無邊，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: sarvabuddhadharmasamudāgamāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /  sarvasattvadhātupuṇyajñānasaṃbhārāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /  pṛthivīdhātvaparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /  evamabdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātvākāśadhātuvijñānadhātvaparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 集無量善法，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 一切法三昧無邊，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: sarvabuddhadharmāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /  sarvadharmāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 佛法無邊，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 法無邊，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake gocare carati /
tgt_original: 如是學者，學自行處。

src_original: śūnyatāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 空無邊，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: cittacaitasikāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /  cittacaritāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 心心數法無邊，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 諸心所行無邊，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: kuśalākuśaladharmāparimāṇatayā prajñāpāramitāparimāṇatā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 善法無量，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是； 不善法無量，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是；

src_original: siṃhanādanadanatayā prajñāpāramitānadanatā anugantavyā /
tgt_original: 如師子吼，當知般若波羅蜜亦如是。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: rūpaṃ hi subhūte samudrasamam /  evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānaṃ hi subhūte samudrasamam /  rūpaṃ hi gaganasamam /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānamaparyantasamam /
tgt_original: 色如大海，受、想、行、識如大海； 色如虛空，受、想、行、識如虛空；

src_original: rūpaṃ sūryamaṇḍalaraśmyutpādasamam /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānaṃ sarvaśabdāparyantasamam /
tgt_original: 色如須彌山莊嚴，受、想、行、識如須彌山莊嚴；

src_original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate nāthakarakeṣu dharmeṣu,
tgt_original: 如是學者，學救護法。

src_original: rūpaṃ sarvasattvadhātvaparyantasamam /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānaṃ sarvasattvadhātvaparyantasamam /
tgt_original: 色如日光，受、想、行、識如日光；

src_original: rūpaṃ sarvabuddhadharmasamudāgamāparyantasamam /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānaṃ sarvabuddhadharmasamudāgamāparyantasamam /
tgt_original: 色如聲無邊，受、想、行、識如聲無邊；

src_original: rūpaṃ sarvasattvadhātupuṇyajñānasaṃbhārāparyantasamam /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānaṃ sarvasattvadhātupuṇyajñānasaṃbhārāparyantasamam /
tgt_original: 色如眾生性無邊，受、想、行、識如眾生性無邊；

src_original: rūpaṃ pṛthivīsamam /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānaṃ pṛthivīsamam /
tgt_original: 色如地，受、想、行、識如地；

src_original: rūpamapsamam /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānamapsamam /  rūpaṃ tejaḥsamam /
tgt_original: 色如水，受、想、行、識如水；

src_original: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānaṃ tejaḥsamam /  rūpaṃ vāyusamam /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānaṃ vāyusamam /  rūpaṃ vijñānasamam /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
tgt_original: 色如火，受、想、行、識如火；

src_original: vijñānaṃ sarvadharmasaṃcayavigatam /  rūpaṃ sarvadharmasamādhyaparyantatāsamam /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānaṃ sarvadharmasamādhyaparyantatāsamam /
tgt_original: 色如風，受、想、行、識如風； 色如空種，受、想、行、識如空種；

src_original: śikṣate mahāmaitryām,  mahāmuditāyāṃ śikṣate,  mahopekṣāyāṃ śikṣate /
tgt_original: 如是學者，學大慈大悲。

src_original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate triparivartasya dvādaśākārasya dharmacakrasya pravartanāya /
tgt_original: 如是學者，學三轉十二相法輪。

src_original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadhātuṃ nonīkariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
tgt_original: 如是學者，學度眾生。

src_original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatavaṃśasyānupacchedāya śikṣate /
tgt_original: 如是學者，學不斷佛種。

src_original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'mṛtadhātudvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
tgt_original: 如是學者，學開甘露門。

src_original: neyaṃ subhūte udārā (Vaidya 211)
tgt_original: 須菩提！

src_original: na hi alpasthāmnā śakyamasyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitum /
tgt_original: 凡夫下劣，不能如是學。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?  sarvasattvasārā hi te subhūte,  sarvasattvanāthakāmā hi te subhūte,  ye 'syāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante /  sarvasattvābhyudgatatāṃ te 'nuprāptukāmāḥ,  ya iha śikṣante /
tgt_original: 欲調御一切眾生者，能如是學。

src_original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nirayeṣūpapadyate,  na tiryagyoniṣūpapadyate,  na pretaviṣayeṣūpapadyate,
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 菩薩如是學者，不墮地獄、畜生、餓鬼，不生邊地。

src_original: bhagavānāha - punaraparaṃ kauśika ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā  vā udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati  upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
tgt_original: 」佛告憍尸迦：

src_original: nāsureṣu kāyeṣūpapadyate,  na pratyantajanapadeṣūpapadyate,  na caṇḍālakuleṣūpapadyate,  na śākunikakuleṣūpapadyate,  na niṣādadhīvaraurabhrikakuleṣūpapadyate,
tgt_original: 如是學者，不生旃陀羅家，不生竹草作家，不生除糞人家，不生諸餘貧賤之家。

src_original: na duḥsaṃsthāno bhavati,  na hīnendriyo bhavati,  na vikalendriyo bhavati /  sarvākāraparipūrṇendriyo bhavati,  svarasaṃpanno bhavati /
tgt_original: 菩薩如是學者，不盲不瞎，不睞眼，不痤短，不聾啞，不頑鈍，不形殘，身根具足。

src_original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prāṇātipātī bhavati,  nādattādāyī bhavati,  na kāmamithyācārī bhavati,  na mṛṣāvādī bhavati,  na paruṣavāgbhavati,  na saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati,  nābhidhyālurbhavati,
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 菩薩如是學者，不奪他命，不盜他物，不邪婬，不妄語，不兩舌，不惡口，不無益語，不貪嫉，不瞋惱，不邪見，不邪命活，不畜邪見眷屬，不畜破戒眷屬。

src_original: evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā /
tgt_original: 如是，須菩提！ 般若波羅蜜大利益諸菩薩，能助阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
tgt_original: 是故，須菩提！

src_original: sarvasattvānāmanuttaratāṃ gantukāmena sarvasattvānāmanāthānāṃ nāthena bhavitukāmena (Vaidya 214)  buddhaviṣayamanuprāptukāmena buddhavṛṣabhitāmanugantukāmena buddhavikrīḍitaṃ vikrīḍitukāmena  buddhasiṃhanādaṃ naditukāmena buddhasaṃpattimanuprāptukāmena trisāhasramahāsāhasre
tgt_original: 若菩薩欲得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，欲於一切眾生中為無上者，欲為一切眾生作救護，欲得具足佛法，欲得佛所行處，欲得佛所遊戲，欲得佛師子吼，欲得三千大千世界、大會講法，當學般若波羅蜜。

src_original: yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyāmantarāyaṇamadhyagato 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito 'bhūvam,
tgt_original: 昔我於眾華城燃燈佛所，不離般若波羅蜜行。

src_original: sacetkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmevamudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan  saṃgrāmaśirasi samārūḍhaḥ syāt /  tasya saṃgrāmamavatarato vā avatīrṇasya vā atikrāmato vā saṃgrāmamadhyagatasya vā
tgt_original: 「善男子、善女人，受持讀誦般若波羅蜜，若入軍陣，誦般若波羅蜜，若住若出，若失壽命，若被惱害，無有是處；

src_original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāhaṃ tāṃ saṃpattiṃ samanupaśyāmi,  yā tena na śikṣitā bhavati /
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 我不見菩薩學般若波羅蜜，不得如是具足之利。

src_original: tatra hi kauśika sattvā na śakyā manuṣyairvā amanuṣyairvā viheṭhayituṃ vā vyāpādayituṃ vā āveśayituṃ vā,  sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam /
tgt_original: 唯除業行，必應受者。 憍尸迦！ 譬如道場四邊，若人若畜生，無能惱者。

src_original: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śrāvakasaṃpattir api tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati?
tgt_original: 」「世尊！ 是菩薩亦得具足聲聞利耶？

src_original: bhagavānāha - śrāvakasaṃpattir api subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati /
tgt_original: 」「須菩提！

src_original: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakasaṃpatyāṃ sthāsyāmīti śikṣate,  śrāvakasaṃpattirvā me bhaviṣyatīti naivaṃ śikṣate /  ye 'pi te subhūte śrāvakagaṇāḥ,  tān api sa jānāti,  na ca tatrāvatiṣṭhate /
tgt_original: 菩薩亦學具足聲聞利，但不願住聲聞法中，欲具足諸功德必皆能知，但不於中住，作是念：

src_original: evaṃ ca vyavacārayati,  na ca prativahati - mayāpyete śrāvakaguṇā deśayitavyāḥ prakāśayitavyā iti śikṣate /
tgt_original: 『我亦當說是聲聞功德，教化眾生。

src_original: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati /  evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāṃstato 'nyān dakṣiṇīyān śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān pratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktāṃścābhibhavati,
tgt_original: 』若菩薩如是學者，能為一切世間天、人、阿修羅作福田，於聲聞、辟支佛福田為最殊勝。

src_original: sarvajñatā cāsya āsannībhavati /  evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati,  prajñāpāramitāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāyāmavirahitaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
tgt_original: 菩薩如是學者，得近薩婆若，不捨般若波羅蜜，不離般若波羅蜜。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tadāhaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau  - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato  'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ  śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti /
tgt_original: 時燃燈佛記我於來世，過阿僧祇劫，當得作佛，號釋迦牟尼如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊。

src_original: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti?
tgt_original: 云何菩薩得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，為世間作究竟道？

src_original: yatsubhūte rūpasya pāraṃ na tadrūpam /  yathā ca subhūte pāraṃ tathā rūpam /  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  yatsubhūte vijñānasya pāraṃ na tadvijñānam /  yathā ca subhūte pāraṃ tathā vijñānam /
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 色究竟不名色，受、想、行、識究竟不名識。 如究竟相，一切法亦如是。

src_original: yathā ca subhūte rūpam,  evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /  vijñānaṃ pāraṃ tathā sarvadharmāḥ /  subhūtirāha - yadi bhagavan yathā rūpam,
tgt_original: 」「世尊！ 若究竟相，一切法亦爾者，菩薩皆應得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: na hyatra bhagavan kaścidvikalpaḥ /
tgt_original: 是中無有分別故。

src_original: bhagavānāha - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
tgt_original: 」「如是，如是！ 須菩提！

src_original: ye 'pi te subhūte atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya parinirvṛtāḥ,  teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmitonirjātaiva sarvajñatā,  yaduta ṣaḍbhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ /
tgt_original: 過去諸佛，皆從六波羅蜜生；

src_original: yattatpāraṃ na tatra kaścidvikalpaḥ /  avikalpatvātsubhūte bodhisattvairmahāsatvairabhisaṃbuddhā eva bhavanti sarvadharmāḥ /  idam api subhūte paramaduṣkaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,  ya evaṃ ca sarvadharmānupanidhyāyanti,  na ca sākṣātkurvanti,
tgt_original: 是中無有分別。

src_original: na cāvalīyante - evamasmābhirete dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ,
tgt_original: 諸菩薩如是觀，如是知，其心不沒，作是念：

src_original: evaṃ ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya enān dharmān deśayiṣyāmaḥ prakāśayiṣyāma ityupanidhyāyanti /
tgt_original: 『我得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，應為眾生說如是法。

src_original: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti /
tgt_original: 』須菩提！ 是名菩薩得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，為世間作究竟道。

src_original: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ (Vaidya 148)  santo lokasya dvīpā bhavanti?
tgt_original: 云何菩薩得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，為世間作洲？
